## daf-did-jwt package

Provides a [plugin](./daf-did-jwt.jwtmessagehandler.md) for the [MessageHandler](./daf-message-handler.messagehandler.md) that finds and verifies a JWT in a message

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [JwtMessageHandler](./daf-did-jwt.jwtmessagehandler.md) | A plugin for [MessageHandler](./daf-message-handler.messagehandler.md) that finds and verifies a JWT in a message |
